articles.title: Why McConnell and more than a dozen Republicans backed the Senate gun control bill - CNN Video
articles.description: For the first time in 30 years, the Senate has passed a major bipartisan gun safety bill. It came the same day that the Supreme Court issued a major ruling on guns, making it easier to access firearms. CNN's Lauren Fox has more.

articles.author: Clare Foran, Kristin Wilson and Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: House is expected to send bipartisan gun safety package to Biden
articles.description: The House is expected to pass a bipartisan bill on Friday to address gun violence that will amount to the first major federal gun safety legislation in decades.

articles.author: By Aditi Sangal, Rhea Mogul, Lianne Kolirin and Ed Upright, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Ukrainian forces will have to withdraw from Severodonetsk, the head of the Luhansk regional military administration, Serhiy Hayday, said Friday, accusing Russia of destroying most of the city's infrastructure. Follow live updates.
articles.content:
It was more a question of when, rather than if, the remaining Ukrainian units in the eastern city of Severodonetsk would be withdrawn.

articles.title: Supreme Court steps on Senate's generational statement on guns with one of its own
articles.description: It was a moment of triumph, hewn from tragedy and years in the making, as the US Senate finally acted after the horror of yet another mass killing and passed the most significant firearms legislation in nearly a generation.

articles.title: Why now? How four senators finally got a gun deal no one thought was possible
articles.description: The day after a gunman massacred 19 children and two teachers in Uvalde, Texas, Democratic Sen. Kyrsten Sinema of Arizona did something she didn't usually do. She stopped off the Senate floor and intentionally gaggled with the Washington press corps.

articles.title: Senate passes first major federal gun safety legislation in decades
articles.description: The Senate on Thursday night passed a bipartisan bill to address gun violence that amounts to the first major federal gun safety legislation in decades.

articles.title: What the Supreme Court's new gun rights ruling means

articles.title: Opinion: The surprising solution to gun violence
articles.description: New insights from behavioral science suggest there's more to situations than root causes like poverty or segregation and help us see progress on the gun violence crisis is much more possible than we've thought, writes Jens Ludwig.
